concept.title: Enabling External JMX Tools
concept.shortdesc: The can provide JMX metrics to third-party tools.

conbody.p:
JMX metricsenabling external JMX toolsJava configuration optionsenabling third-party JMX toolingThe following Java environment variables enable passing JMX metrics to external tools:
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=<port_number>
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.local.only=<true | false>
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=<true | false>
Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=<true | false>
You can pass the variables in the command line if you start the manually. Or, you can add the variables to the SDC_JAVA_OPTS environment variable in the environment file.
